title: Apply refreshed Mahalaxmi Health Care logo across header/footer and icons

requirements.summary: Refresh the Mahalaxmi Health Care brand logo and ensure the header/footer render it from the existing generated asset path.
acceptanceCriteria: A new logo design is produced and saved as a generated static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The Site Header uses /assets/generated/mahalaxmi-health-care-logo.dim_512x512.png for the brand mark (as in frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx).

The Site Footer uses /assets/generated/mahalaxmi-health-care-logo.dim_512x512.png (with cache-busting) and renders without triggering the logo error state (as in frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFooter.tsx).

file_operations.description: Replace the existing generated logo asset with the redesigned, clean healthcare-appropriate logo while keeping the exact filename and 512x512 dimensions so existing header/footer references continue to work.

requirements.summary: Update favicon and Apple touch icons to match the new logo while preserving the exact filenames referenced by the HTML head.
acceptanceCriteria: The following icon files exist in frontend/public/assets/generated and visually match the new logo: mahalaxmi-health-care-favicon.dim_32x32.png, mahalaxmi-health-care-favicon.dim_192x192.png, mahalaxmi-health-care-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png.
frontend/index.html continues to reference these exact filenames, and the icons display correctly in the browser tab and on mobile home screen shortcuts (where supported).

file_operations.description: Replace the 32x32 favicon PNG to visually match the refreshed logo while preserving the exact filename so frontend/index.html references remain valid.
Replace the 192x192 favicon PNG to visually match the refreshed logo while preserving the exact filename so frontend/index.html references remain valid.
Replace the 180x180 Apple touch icon PNG to visually match the refreshed logo while preserving the exact filename so frontend/index.html references remain valid.
